item.title: Simplified deployment with Defender for Identity
item.description:
Introduction Microsoft Defender for Identity is an essential part of a modern security practice, helping your organization protect against, and respond to, identity-based threats. In this blog we will show you the simple steps for deploying Microsoft Defender for Identity within your environment.
Before we get into the deployment overview however, let’s quickly cover some of the benefits of deploying Defender for Identity:
